tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This function is used to identify signature genes at specific development stage.
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
* **Gene expression matrix**: Gene expression matrix generated through the function **MATRIX PREPARATION**.
.. csv-table:: :header: " ", "Sample1", "Sample2", "Sample3", "Sample4" :widths: 15, 10, 10, 10, 10
"Zm00001d027230", 1.569, 1.319, 0.848, 0.480 "Zm00001d027233", 0, 0.0414, 0.0162, 0 "Zm00001d027236", 0.554, 1.365, 1.728, 1.109 "Zm00001d027240", 4.000, 4.263, 5.017, 4.724
|
* **Amplitude matrix**: An amplitude matrix generated from the gene expression matrix through the function **MATRIX PREPARATION**.
.. csv-table:: :header: " ", "Metagene1", "Metagene2", "Metagene3", "Metagene4" :widths: 15, 10, 10, 10, 10
"Zm00001d027230", 0.322, 0.435, 0.555, 0.459 "Zm00001d027233", 0.00257, 0.00907, 0.00244, 0.00639 "Zm00001d027236", 0, 0.813, 0.0322, 0.0295 "Zm00001d027240", 0.921, 0.626, 0.442, 0.271
|
* **Pattern matrix**: A pattern matrix generated from the gene expression matrix through the function **MATRIX PREPARATION**.
.. csv-table:: :header: " ", "Metagene1", "Metagene2", "Metagene3" :widths: 10, 10, 10, 10
"SRR1169626", 0, 0.0270, 0.0174 "SRR1169627", 0.258, 0, 0 "SRR1169628", 1.110, 0, 0.0372 "SRR1169629", 0.999, 0.0554, 0.0638
|
* **Developmental information of the samples**: Developmental information of the samples.
.. csv-table:: :header: "Sample", "Stage" :widths: 10, 10
"Sample1", 0 "Sample2", 4 "Sample3", 8 "Sample4", 12
|
* **Threads**: The cpu number to parallelly compute.
-------------
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
* **Signature genes of each module**: Signature genes of each metagene.
+-----------+--------------------+------------------------------------+ | Metagene | Gene ID | Gene description | +===========+====================+====================================+ | Metagene1 | Zm00001d020505 |DNA glycosylase superfamily protein | +-----------+--------------------+------------------------------------+ | Metagene2 | Zm00001d012083 |Thioredoxin F-type chloroplastic | +-----------+--------------------+------------------------------------+ | Metagene3 | Zm00001d033585 |Leaf permease1 | +-----------+--------------------+------------------------------------+
|
